Container.Name: Farming Simulator 22 Server
Container.Changes:
[center][img width='155px' src='https://raw.githubusercontent.com/wine-gameservers/docker-winebased-server-fs22/main/misc/fs22_top_logo.png'][/center]
[center][font size=4]FS22 Server Change Log[/font][/center]
[font size=3]2022.01.10[/font] - Initial Release many thanks to Aussie Farmer!
Container.Overview: The Farming Simulator 22 server, farm with friends!
Container.Description: Running the farming simulator 22 server on UnRaid!

Config.Name: Server Installer
Config.Description: This directory contains the farming simulator 22 installer! Downloaded from https://eshop.giants-software.com/

Config.Name: config
Config.Description: This directory contains the content of

Config.Name: game installation path
Config.Description: This directory contains the installed game, it survives docker image updates, hence it only needs to be installed once!

Config.Name: VNC Viewer
Config.Description: This is the port used to connect to the VNC Server, you can use tools like vnc viewer to do so!

Config.Name: Farming Simulator 22 admin panel
Config.Description: This the port used for the Farming Simulator 22 admin panel, once the server is running you can acces this port to configure your personal farming server!

Config.Name: VNC Web Server
Config.Description: This is the port used for the VNC webserver, you can acces the server vnc web client by browsing towards this port, this is usefull if you don't use a VNC program to acces the vnc server but just like to use an browser!

Config.Name: Gameserver TCP Port
Config.Description: This is the TCP port used for the gameserver, it allows you and other people to connect to the server and thus farm togheter!

Config.Name: Gameserver UDP Port
Config.Description: This is the UDP port used for the gameserver, it allows you and other people to connect to the server and thus farm togheter!

Config.Name: USERNAME
Config.Description: This is the username used inside the docker container.

Config.Name: VNC_PASSWORD
Config.Description: We need to secure the VNC server, let us login with a password!

Config.Name: RESOLUTION
Config.Description: This is the RESOLUTION used for the VNC Client, so if you connect to the vnc server you will get an awesome 720p window!

Config.Name: SERVER_NAME
Config.Description: We can pre-configure the Farming Simulator 22 server name!

Config.Name: SERVER_ADMIN
Config.Description: The server admin, password we don't wan't people to sell our stuff!

Config.Name: SERVER_PASSWORD
Config.Description: Only people that know this super secret password can join our server, don't share it to the wild!

Config.Name: SERVER_PLAYERS
Config.Description: Sixteen awesome farmers can join us by default!

Config.Name: SERVER_PORT
Config.Description: This is the port for the game server, don't change it unless you know what you are doing!

Config.Name: SERVER_REGION
Config.Description:
One of the following: en, de, jp, pl, cz, fr, es, ru, it, pt, hu, nl, cs, ct, br, tr, ro, kr, ea, da, fi, no, sv, fc
This allows you to place the server under a region, don't forget to select the right region in the game or you will not be able to find the server, even with the best eyes on the world!

Config.Name: SERVER_MAP
Config.Description: Default: MapUS (Elmcreek), other official maps are: MapFR (Haut-Beyleron), MapAlpine (Erlengrat)

Config.Name: SERVER_DIFFICULTY
Config.Description: Default: 3, start from scratch

Config.Name: SERVER_PAUSE
Config.Description: Default: 2 Pause the server if no players are connected 1, never pause the server

Config.Name: SERVER_SAVE_INTERVAL
Config.Description: Save the game each180 seconds!

Config.Name: SERVER_STATS_INTERVAL
Config.Description:
Default: 120.000000, webapi is not supported anymore for FS22 so lets give it an odd number so it doesen't spam the logs!
Stupid devs.
